qas.question: What year was the turning point for Germany in the Nation Brands Index?
What year did BBC reveal that Germany is the most positive influence in the world?
what percentage have a negative view of Germany?
What percentage of people have a positive view of Germany?

plausible_answers.text: l Nation Brands Index global survey,

qas.question: What index ranked Germany high before the 2006 FIFA World Cup?
In what year was Germany ranked the most valued nation?
In what year ws Germany recognized as the most influential country in the world?
Who's global opinion poll showed 14% of people having a positive opinion of Germany?

context: Since the <a0_0>2006<a0_0/> FIFA World Cup, the internal and external evaluation of Germany's national image has changed. In the annua<b4_0>l Nation Brands Index global survey,<b4_0/> Germany became significantly and repeatedly more highly ranked after the tournament. People in 20 different states assessed the country's reputation in terms of culture, politics, exports, its people and its attractiveness to tourists, immigrants and investments. Germany has been named the world's second most valued nation among 50 countries in <b5_0>2010<b5_0/>. Another global opinion poll, for the <b7_0>BBC<b7_0/>, revealed that Germany is recognised for the most positive influence in the world in <a1_0><b6_0>2010<b6_0/><a1_0/>. A majority of <a3_0>59<a3_0/>% have a positive view of the country, while <a2_0>14%<a2_0/> have a negative view.
